problem_names: lemma rabin_param[param]: "(rabin, rabin) \<in> rabin_rel A \<rightarrow> pred_rel (\<langle>A\<rangle> stream_rel)"
lemma gen_param[param]: "(gen, gen) \<in> (A \<rightarrow> pred_rel B) \<rightarrow> (\<langle>A\<rangle> list_rel \<rightarrow> pred_rel B)"
lemma cogen_param[param]: "(cogen, cogen) \<in> (A \<rightarrow> pred_rel B) \<rightarrow> (\<langle>A\<rangle> list_rel \<rightarrow> pred_rel B)"
translations: lemma rabin_param[param]: "(rabin, rabin) \<in> rabin_rel A \<rightarrow> pred_rel (\<langle>A\<rangle> stream_rel)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (rabin, rabin)
    \<in> (A \<rightarrow> bool_rel) \<times>\<^sub>r
          (A \<rightarrow> bool_rel) \<rightarrow>
          \<langle>A\<rangle>stream_rel \<rightarrow> bool_rel

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>(I, F) w. infs I w \<and> fins F w,
     \<lambda>(I, F) w. infs I w \<and> fins F w)
    \<in> (A \<rightarrow> bool_rel) \<times>\<^sub>r
          (A \<rightarrow> bool_rel) \<rightarrow>
          \<langle>A\<rangle>stream_rel \<rightarrow> bool_rel
lemma gen_param[param]: "(gen, gen) \<in> (A \<rightarrow> pred_rel B) \<rightarrow> (\<langle>A\<rangle> list_rel \<rightarrow> pred_rel B)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (gen, gen)
    \<in> (A \<rightarrow> B \<rightarrow> bool_rel) \<rightarrow>
          \<langle>A\<rangle>list_rel \<rightarrow> B \<rightarrow> bool_rel

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>P cs w. \<forall>c\<in>set cs. P c w,
     \<lambda>P cs w. \<forall>c\<in>set cs. P c w)
    \<in> (A \<rightarrow> B \<rightarrow> bool_rel) \<rightarrow>
          \<langle>A\<rangle>list_rel \<rightarrow> B \<rightarrow> bool_rel
lemma cogen_param[param]: "(cogen, cogen) \<in> (A \<rightarrow> pred_rel B) \<rightarrow> (\<langle>A\<rangle> list_rel \<rightarrow> pred_rel B)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (cogen, cogen)
    \<in> (A \<rightarrow> B \<rightarrow> bool_rel) \<rightarrow>
          \<langle>A\<rangle>list_rel \<rightarrow> B \<rightarrow> bool_rel

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>P cs w. \<exists>c\<in>set cs. P c w,
     \<lambda>P cs w. \<exists>c\<in>set cs. P c w)
    \<in> (A \<rightarrow> B \<rightarrow> bool_rel) \<rightarrow>
          \<langle>A\<rangle>list_rel \<rightarrow> B \<rightarrow> bool_rel
